mapper.insert: insert into reply (rno, bno, reply, replayer, hide, type) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replayer}, #{hide},'자유')
insert into reply (rno, bno, reply, replayer, hide, type) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replayer}, #{hide},'갤러리')
mapper.update: update reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from reply where bno = #{rno}
